name: discontinued  MYANIMELIST | Tiles For Favorites 1
description: **Recent MAL profile changes has broken this script** Tiles for Favourites 1, simply turns the favourites on your profile into a tile-layout! This was made after made requests here, for a better layout for the current favourites system on MAL.
additional_info: Check out the Version 2 here! The reason I have not uploaded version 2, instead this one, is because version 2 requires a Tampermonkey userscript (.js script) to run. See instructions on how to get version 2 here! Version 2 is placed in the left panel on the profile, with 5 columns by 2 rows of pictures instead of this, where it is 4 columns and 3 rows (2 pictures leftover on the third row). This script gets rid of the favourite's information, and changes the style into tiles! Master thread on MAL profile improvements since the profile update!
